[LEXICON]: Intentional but pervasive lisp ("Ith", "thith") may disrupt natural flow for some readers.
[SYNTAX]: Occasional awkward phrasing (e.g., "splay-tongued reptile-humanoids... spoke Interstellar Coine with a pronounced lisp").

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt shift to unnamed Earthgirl’s perspective without clear narrative link.
[CLARITY]: Unexplained introduction of Earthgirl’s telepathic ability.
[STRUCTURE]: Sudden scene shift to Englander’s family subplot feels disconnected.

[LEXICON]: Intentional stylized dialogue (e.g., "thertainly") may slightly disrupt readability for some readers.

[TRANSITION]: Mild abruptness in shifting from Englander’s flat to the gambling hall, though contextually justified.
